name: Blackjack-black jack 21 casino
description:
MOST popular Blackjack game on the store.This is a free Blackjack game that you can play against the dealer. The game is designed for both the iPhone and iPad. Play Black jack against the dealer and see who can WIN by getting 21 without going bust!

• Best blackjack trainer which helps you in real time casino.
• Theme specific cards, HD graphics.
• Easy and fun to play.
• Interactive game play with voice overs.
• Play multiple hands against the dealer.
• Tap or drag to place the bet.
• Tap to split your cards
• Choose between different table themes .
• Blackjack casino rules pays 3 : 2
• Insurance: pays 2:1 if the dealer has Blackjack .
• Hit: Take another card from the dealer.
• Double : The player is allowed to increase the initial bet by up to 100% in exchange for committing to stand after receiving exactly one more card.

There's always more! Our team is already developing content for our next major update!
This game is for amusement purposes only & is intended for use by players 21 and over.
